Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    The "Room" class represents one location of the map in the game Each room has a short description, a full description and an ID number Each room is connected to other rooms via exits For each existing exit, the room stores a reference to the neighboring room Exits can be set as 'locked' or 'unlocked' The class also stores an ArrayList of items in the room and one of pillar objects in the room
    Version:
    ('Escape' Version 3 - 18/11/2017)
    Author:
    (Anthony Wythe)

        public Room(int roomID,
            java.lang.String description,
            java.lang.String fullDescription)
        Create a room described by its "description". Initially, it has no exits. ALso creates the full description and the items ArrayLists and HashMaps
        Parameters:
        int - roomID: rooms ID numer
        String - description: short description of the room
        String - fullDescription: full description of the room
